name: Gitter Don't Even Talk
description: Removes the input box on gitter.im, keeping you from chatting entirely, making for a read-only gitter experience. Goes great with Gitter Don't to get rid of the clutter.
additional_info: This was broken out from Gitter Don't to make it easy to temporarily re-enable the chatbox with a simple checkbox tick in stylish while keeping the rest of the uncluttered look.
